title: Luctus britannici, or, The tears of the British muses for the death of John Dryden, Esq., late poet laureat to Their Majesties, K. Charles and K. James the Second written by the most eminent hands in the two famous universities, and by several others.
author: Playford, Henry, b. 1657.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed for Henry Playford ... and Abel Roper ... and sold by John Nutt ...,
